name: WereTank
description:
Every full moon this tractor turns into a tank! avoid, or fight the villagers!

movement : W S A D
aim: mouse
shoot: left mouse click 
sprint: Shift
Rotate camera: Q & E

💲 Shooting during the day says "Howdy" - villagers will shoot a howdy back at you with a cash reward! 💲
Shoot a howdy at the stores in each corner to get resources.
Keep getting money to turn into fuel, health and ammo and survive another night!!!

Credits:
